answerText: The Rime of the Ancient Mariner[10] This unfinished poem is about a woman who encounters a vampiric stranger named Geraldine.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 7 | 21 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name some Samuel Taylor Coleridge poems, for 10 points each. [10] In this poem, the title sailor tells a wedding guest about his killing of an albatross, which is hung around his neck as punishment.
